org.modelio.vbasic.net

Class CachedUriFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.modelio.vbasic.net.CachedUriFile

  • public class CachedUriFile
extends Object
    Allows to cache a file referenced by an URI in a local directory.

    When accessing the file, the stamp on the server is compared to the stamp stored in a stamp file in the same directory. The file is downloaded only if the stamps are different.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CachedUriFile

        public CachedUriFile(URI uri,
             Path destDirectory,
             IAuthData authData)
        Parameters:
        uri - the URI to cache.
        destDirectory - the destination directory.
        authData - authentication data, may be null.

    • Method Detail

      • setTimeout

        public void setTimeout(int timeout)
        Sets a specified timeout value, in milliseconds, to be used when opening a communications link to the referenced URI. If the timeout expires before the connection can be established, a java.net.SocketTimeoutException is raised. A timeout of zero is interpreted as an infinite timeout.
        Parameters:
        timeout - the time out

      • getFile

        public Path getFile()
             throws IOException,
                    FileSystemException
        Get a path to the up to date file.

        Download the file from the remote location if needed.

        Returns:
        the cached file path.
        Throws:
        FileSystemException - in case of file system exception. Use FileUtils.getLocalizedMessage(FileSystemException) to get an error message.
        IOException - in case of other I/O errors.

      • hasChanged

        public boolean hasChanged()
        Tells whether last call to getFile() changed the cached file.
        Returns:
        true if the cached file has been modified, else false.

      • getCachedFileLocation

        public Path getCachedFileLocation()
        Get the path of the last retrieved file.

        This method does not access the network and the file may not exist.

        Returns:
        the path where the cached file is downloaded.
